about_the_game:
Stuck in an underground laboratory without any memories, you witness horrible crimes. Knowing you will be next one day, you start planning your escape. Who can you trust? How can you control the power you feel inside of you? And will you ever fully recover your lost memories along with the truth?

-x-

Project Nihilum Zero is a narrative-driven Visual Novel set in a futuristic, dystopian world where reality and illusion collide. As brainwashed, kidnapped inmate in an underground laboratory, you will navigate a web of secrets, strange entities, and choices that will give you insight into different points of view of the story.

-x-

“They whisper in the dark. Do you hear them? The Origin calls to you, following you through floor after floor of the laboratory. You’re not the first to walk these corridors, and you won’t be the last. But maybe, just maybe, you’ll be the one who finally understands. Step into the void, make your choice, or let the choice make you. What will you become? You have nothing left to lose. Except… some fingers, a leg, maybe a kidney or two?

-x-

Features:
  • STORY: Experience a dark narrative filled with twists, hidden lore, and choices that pull you deeper into a world where nothing is as it seems.
  • VOICE ACTING: Every character's dialogues are voiced by our talented voice actors.
  • MUSIC: The game features original soundtracks. You can unlock and listen to them in the game's music gallery.
  • UPDATES: The game will be updated with new episodes, adding new gameplay to each of the 3 routes.
  • CENSOR MODE: A censor mode can be activated at the beginning, allowing the player to experience censored versions of some scenes.
  • IMAGE GALLERY: Unlock various images throughout the story and view them in the game's gallery.
  • MEMORIES: Discover the past of the characters in snippets by using a certain ability.
  • ABILITIES: Play with 1 of 3 abilities: Hybrid, Shape Shifting or Mind Glimpse. Depending on the ability, you can unlock certain scenes, memories or routes.
  • MAIN CHARACTER: The main character will not be shown in the game. A custom name and pronouns (he/she/they) can be choosen.
  • STORY: Discover what happened to you before your memories were taken from you and chose your new 'familiy'.
  • ROUTES: Play 1 of 3 routes and discover the overall story through different perspectives.

    AVAILABLE ROUTES
  • THE LABORATORIES: The organization that kidnapped you. Why on earth would you join and help them? (Because you want to spend time with the smart science people, we know.)They will use you for their benefit, but you can do so as well. What will you encounter in the endless corridors? And will you make it out alive or become one of them?
  • TRUE PARADISE: You want a found family? This is the route you want to play. After all, everyone will show up here for shelter. Some of them are victims, some are former employees of the Labs. And - of course - a few of them are involved in shady business, playing every trick to accomplish their plans.
  • THE BOUNTY HUNTERS: A mysterious organization, found by an individual who is told to be no human at all. Money, hunting, and lies make it hard to believe any of them.


Are you a streamer?
You can stream this game IF you add a creative aspect (audio commentary, ...). Recording the game and uploading it without adding anything to it, is not allowed. We want to promote creative content creators and NOT want our game to be used for clicks and views without putting creative effort into it.

content_descriptors.notes:
[The game covers topics that may not be suitable for sensitive individuals.]
These include...
- Medical horror
- Psychological horror
- Mention of drugs and substance abuse
- Flashbacks dealing with kidnapping and brainwashing

  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 650 MB available space
  • VR Support: No

short_description: Project Nihilum Zero is a narrative-driven Visual Novel. Discover the twisted story from different points of views and make your own choices. Discover 1 or 3 abilities: Mind Glimpse, Shape Shift and Hybrid. Use your ability wisely to see the past, influence the present and shape the future.
